PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: Merritt shot a two-under-par 69 on Saturday to take a three-stroke lead into the final round of the RBC Heritage in Hilton Head Island, S.C.
snippet: Merritt shot a two-under-par 69 on Saturday to take a three-stroke lead into the final round of the RBC Heritage in Hilton Head Island, S.C.
